name: My Piou - Virtual Pet Bird 3D
description:
My Piou - Virtual Pet Bird 3D is a game about all kind of colorful Piou fluffy birdies. You take care of them, feed them, make them take a bath, and mostly, play with them in beautiful 3D mini games.

🐤 AMAZING FEATURES :
Customize your wonderful piou house, from wallpaper to furniture. Your Piou bird will love watching TV or sleep near the fireplace, many amazing items and decorations to discover ! Do Quests to earn extra coins and make your Piou birds so happy. You can share your mini games score in leaderboards and compete with your Piou friends.

🐤 COLOR BREEDING SYSTEM :
My Piou has a powerful color breeding system to make you able to create colorful fluffy and rare colors. You can store colors to recreate birds from it, create your own breed and show it to the Piou Bird Community.

🐤 COLLECT ITEMS :
Collect wearable hats, collect coins, golden eggs. If you love surprise eggs, you'll love this game. There is plenty of way to get coins, discover them all to be rich fast and make your Piou birds lovely.

🐤 EASY TO PLAY :
Colorful fluffy piou birdies is both easy and challenging game to play with you friends. It is translated in French, English, Spanish, Portuguese, English. Features are well explained (it includes TIPS) and accessible for everybody.

🐤 CONNECT WITH FRIENDS :
You can play Multiplayer 1 vs 1 in an amazing game mode, dexterity and rapidity are the keys. Not enough items or coins to buy medics for your Piou Birds ? It's ok, get connected with your Facebook account and request help from your Piou Birds Friends. You can visit your Friend's house, clean their house and collect extra coins and experience points. Join the Google + or Facebook Official Piou Community and discover news, tips, and unlock codes to get free items.

🐤 TABLET AND SMARTPHONE SUPPORT
My Piou Bird is designed for smartphones as well as tablets. What are you waiting for ? Join the Piou Bird Community now ! It's the Bird Paradise Game you ever wanted !

🐤 MINI GAMES LIST (More to come !) :
- Match3 : Align food and make them explode, gain energy and spend it to create combos with powerful skills and go through 50+ Levels !
- Kick : Make your piou fly as far as possible, collect coins, eat food and make your Piou Bigger !
- Memo : Play the song as your Piou Bird does, this game will help you get a better memory !
- Snake : Eat food and your Piou will lay egg that will follow it, try to get eggs as much as possible without running into them !
- Repeat : Speak and your Piou will repeat what you said like a parrot !
- Swing : Tap screen to change Piou's fly direction, try to get high as much as possible !
- Garden : Take care of a Plant, water it and it will produce different kind of Food, from tomatoes to hamburger
- Floppy : Tap to make your Piou fly in the air, avoid pipes, go as far as you can and collect Orbs. Orbs will unlock new level. There are 4 Levels inside Floppy Piou !
- Floppy Multiplayer : Connect to Google Play and compete against your friend in a 1 vs 1 Mode.
- Firework : Tap the right button to explode the fireworks !
- Football : If you don't have time to play a mini game, this one will make all your Pious play alone and recover their happiness by themselves !

Please note : This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money.

You can download the game on Google Play :
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dreamonauts.floppybirdslife
